00037 namespace omega
00038 {
00039         class NaturalPointService : public Service
00040         {
00041         public:
00042                 // Allocator function
00043                 static NaturalPointService* New() { return new NaturalPointService(); }
00044 
00045         public:
00046                 NaturalPointService();
00047                 ~NaturalPointService();
00048                 void setup( Setting& settings);
00049                 static void __cdecl frameController(sFrameOfMocapData* data, void* pUserData);
00050                 static void __cdecl messageController(int msgType, char* msg);
00051                 virtual void initialize();
00052                 virtual void start();//initialize and start service here
00053                 virtual void stop();//destroy service instance to stop
00054                 virtual void dispose();
00055                 //may want to support the option to choose whether to have unicast or multicast networking
00056                 //for now it is hard coded to multicast
00057         private:
00058                 static double Pi;
00059                 static NaturalPointService* myMoCap;
00060                 NatNetClient* pClient;
00061                 int castType;                   //This determines wether the information is multicast or unicast across the network sockets. 0 = multicast and 1 = unicast
00062                 char localIP[128];              //the IP address of this machine, it is found automatically if it is set to an empty string (e.g. "")
00063                 char serverIP[128];             //Server's IP address assumed to be local if left blank
00064
